    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_77274acd49428fa3cf88b9559885e34d57614193</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_77274acd49428fa3cf88b9559885e34d57614193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plant as a basic food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrieb als grundlegende Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usine comme aliment de base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta como um alimento básico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianta come alimento di base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις ως βασικά τρόφιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planta como alimento básico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that even carnivores depend on plants for their food.  Dogs eat rabbits which grew by eating plants.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant food</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß sogar 
fleischfressende Tiere von den Betrieben für ihre Nahrung abhängen. 
Hunde essen Kaninchen, die wuchsen, indem sie Betriebe aßen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que même les 
carnivores dépendent des usines pour leur nourriture. Les 
chiens mangent des lapins qui se sont développés en mangeant des 
usines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que mesmo os carnivores 
dependem das plantas para seu alimento. Os cães comem os 
coelhos que cresceram comendo plantas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che persino i 
carnivori dipendono dalle piante per il loro alimento. I cani 
mangiano i conigli che si sono sviluppati mangiando le piante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ακόμη και carnivores
εξαρτώνται από τις εγκαταστάσεις για τα τρόφιμά τους. Τα 
σκυλιά τρώνε τα κουνέλια που αυξήθηκαν με την κατανάλωση των 
εγκαταστάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que incluso los 
carnívoros dependen de las plantas para su alimento. Los perros
comen los conejos que crecieron comiendo las plantas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fleischfressende Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsnahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aliment végétal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimento de planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carnivori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimento vegetale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρόφιμα εγκαταστάσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carnívoros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fortalecedor de plantas</string>
          </keyword>
